page.title: 08SCHOOLS SERVING CLUNTON AREA
page.content: In common with many other rural areas there aren't many children living in the community. Those that do, have to travel to school by bus or car. There is no school within the block and Junior children have to travel to Clunbury School. Those that live further than two miles away are are taken there by bus free of charge. The remainder are either taken by car or, if they live on a bus route, are allowed to use the school bus though they have to pay fares. The Secondary school children are taken by bus to Bishop's Castle High School eight miles away. There is the option of going to Ludlow School but the transport in that case is not free.
